targets.expr: sum by(method, path) (rate(meilisearch_http_response_time_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", instance=~"$instance", job="$job"}[5m])) / sum by(method, path) (rate(meilisearch_http_response_time_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", instance=~"$instance", job="$job"}[5m]))

panels.description: number of requests per second, faceted by its HTTP status code
panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: percentage of 4xx and 5xx HTTP responses over the total of the requests
panels.title: Error Rate
Search response time distribution over time
Task queue used size in bytes
Task queue available size until it stop receiving tasks.

list.description: Prometheus job_name from scrape config (default is meilisearch)
list.label: Job
list.name: job
